mainSequence.step: TM requests email templates from RC
RC checks existing templates in DB
DB informs RC about non-availability of templates
RC requests specific template details from TM
RC submits draft to AA for approval
RC resubmits revised template to AA
RC stores the new template in DB
RC informs TM about template availability
DB provides existing templates to RC
TM customizes template for current need
TM initiates recruitment process using the template
